turn.6: 43 B/5 (8448) This rock is situated inside the old village of Banjot on right side of seasonal "nalla" (river), which split the hamlet of Banjot in the middle in to two parts.
turn.7: What other gods are referred to in the rock?
turn.8: The rock reveals standing figure of "Brahamnical" god Siva having prominent "prabhamandala" behind his head.
turn.9: Is there anything else carved into the rock?
turn.10: He wears a loose garment clinging down to the knee, and shows four hand- two on each side.
